alert.note: Alert for Sublette (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 5:28PM MDT until August 05 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN SUBLETTE COUNTY... At 525 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Daniel, or 13 miles north of Big Piney, moving north at 30 mph. Up to an inch of rain fell in less than 20 minutes in the town of Big Piney. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Localized flooding is possible. Locations impacted include... Pinedale, Big Piney, Marbleton, Daniel, Sublette County Fairgrounds and Big Piney Marbleton Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
